hirondelle.starfield.catalog.parser

Class Chomper

  • Object
    • hirondelle.starfield.catalog.parser.Chomper

  • final class Chomper
extends Object
    Chop up a single line of a star catalog into the parts needed by this tool. Bit of a hodge-podge for different format policies, as seen in different catalogs.

    Note that the numbers passed to these methods use the 'byte numbers' typically specified by a catalog, and those numbers start at 1, not 0.
